name: DBParameterGroup
description: Creates a custom parameter group for an RDS database family. For more information about RDS parameter groups, see Working with DB Parameter Groups in the Amazon Relational Database Service User Guide.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A friendly description of the RDS parameter group. For example, "My Parameter Group".

properties.name: Family
properties.description: The database family of this RDS parameter group. For example, "MySQL5.1".

properties.name: Parameters
properties.description: The parameters to set for this RDS parameter group.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags that you want to attach to the RDS parameter group.
